1.content:
I regained consciousness but kept my eyes shut. Where was I again? My room? I couldn't remember the last place I was, but then it came to me. The park! No. That couldn't be it. I was lying on a soft bed. Kara must have driven me back to my -or her- house while I was asleep. Asleep?! Was I Emily now??

"SHIT!!" I jumped out of the bed, which was in Kara's room. My now higher, more feminine voice, confirmed my suspicions.
http://thechive.files.wordpress.com/2012...

"Oh! 'Emily'! You're up!" Kara laughed. I could tell she was enjoying herself. She sat on a chair in the opposite side of my room admiring my body.

"No. No. No. No. No. No. No. Change me back!!" I was panicking.

"Jack!" Kara interrupted my freak-out.

"What??!!"

"Calm down, Jack."

I became silent and slowed my breathing. "Look at me..."

"Oh, I sure am!" Kara smiled. She motioned for me to sit back down on the bed with her. "You'll make a great Emily, ...Jack."

"But what if I can't change back? What if you lose the pendant?"

"Jack, if I kept it safe all these years, what makes you think I'll lose it now?"

"I guess you're right. So I'm Emily now, for the next month?" I delicately stroked my boobs, admiring every litte detail on Emily's smooth skin.

"You bet you are! I'm gonna call you Emily from now on." Kara said.

It was quite a feeling. I felt like an intruder in my own body, but at the same time, I couldn't stop thinking about putting it to good use. "I don't have anything to wear."

"That's an easy fix." Kara once again pinched her pendant with her left hand and pressed her right hand into Emily's soft, pillowy chest. In a matter of seconds, I was wearing a white flowery bombshell bra and tight pink corset-type thing (I had never seen one before, but I sure approved). This got me giddy with excitement.

"Wow! I never... I'm actually Emily! I'm a chick -through and ...through!" I squealed with joy. I felt like giggling uncontrollably! http://thechive.files.wordpress.com/2012...

"Haha! 'Emily', that's ..um.. quite a reaction!"

"Well, put yourself in my shoes. I have both Emily's and your (I winked my eye) body all to myself. That's what I call a good day!"

Kara was practically drooling over Emily's luscious ultra-feminine body at this point. "And it's a pretty good day for me to." She said with the hungriest eyes I had ever seen. I felt like an ornament, but I didn't care. We lay down on the bed together and shared a long kiss.
http://retroeuropeanporn.com/images/astr...
^That's me on top.
1.title: Waking Up

11.content:
This was one of the greatest kisses of my life. I did not have to many girlfriends before, but I had some kisses, but kissing Kara was the best thing and I was enjoying it very much, even when the cost for this was to become a chick…
“We need to leave the park, Emily! There is one old guy with a dog and he hates girls and lesbians in particular. When he sees us kissing here, his dog will bite us!”
So she took my now smaller female Emily hand and guides me to…..
11.title: We continue kissing...

choices: No one is home right now. The two of you can play!
112.content:
“Where are we going?” I asked Kara.

The very sound of my voice was delicious – a happy, chirping, melody.

My heart had always belonged to Kara. I'd worshiped and adored her for a long time, never fully understanding the reason she kept us at arm's length (until today, of course).

But I had to admit, Emily was an incredibly attractive girl. Her long, strawberry hair felt soft and silky as it brushed against my neck and shoulders. Her voice was honeyed sweetness coming from my lips. Her tiny, dainty little body was curved and rounded in all the right places.

If Kara had inhabited this body, it would have been absolute perfection: the spirit of my soul mate in the body of the drop-dead gorgeous Emily.

Instead, it seemed fate had something very different in store from my own idle fantasies.

Instead, I was the one inhabiting Emily's body … and enjoying a clandestine, lesbian relationship with the woman of my dreams!

“We're going to your house, Emily,” Kara said, squeezing my hand gently.

It still sent a tingle of excitement up my spine hearing Kara refer to me as “Emily.” I almost couldn't believe it. Here I was, out in public and holding hands with Kara while she called me Emily.

I grinned like a lunatic.

“My house?” I said with a nervous giggle. “Why?”

“You're going to be Emily for the next month,” answered Kara. “That means you'll be living at her house. Sleeping in her bed. Wearing her clothes. Eating her food. Doing her school work.”

“And sleeping with her girlfriend?” I said, with another timid giggle.

“Yes, love!” Kara replied, gently kissing me on the lips. “Finally, we'll be together. But you must promise to be a good steward of Emily's life during the next month. I'll help you of course. Familiarize you with Emily's house and family and so forth. And long with a crash course in the basics of how to be a woman.”

“I'm enjoying the experience so far,” I smiled.

“It isn't all wine and roses!” laughed Kara. “But so far, you're doing an admirable job. I'm proud of you for agreeing to this Jack.”

“Please,” I grinned. “Call me Emily.”
112.title: Emily's home

1121.content:
Kara held my hand as we walk through the door of my new house.

As I walked in Emily's mother looked at us and smiled... "so you two girls have finally admitted you're feeling for each other... Then I heard a male voice from the living room shout (thank god I was wondering when you two where ever going to do that).

Both me and Kara smiled and gave each other a quick kiss and hug... I heard a crying noise and Emily's mother said "Emily darling can you go get Emilia for me I bet she's hungry"
1121.title: Meet Emily's parents.

1123.content:
I take Kara up to my(Emily's) room and just as Kara crosses through the door I shut the door and plant my lips on her's. Her lips are warm and soft, I can feel her tongue twisting I my mouth, entangling with mine. We hold the kiss for a long time before Kara then pulls away, a look of amazement glows across her face.

"That was great, Emily", a smirk crosses her face and she begins to unbutton her shirt,"but I know other ways of how to make this more interesting and exciting,"Kara then throws off her shirt revealing her great body with C-cup breast tuck tightly in her small black bra.

Seeing this, I take off my shirt revealing my newly acquired breasts in my(Emily's) bra. With my fingers I undo the back of the strap and pop the bra off. My breasts fall into their normal natural state. Kara dose the same and before I know it Kara is on top of me suck on my mouth. I have several ideas of wait to do next...
1123.title: No one is home right now. The two of you can play!

info.brief_description: My girlfriend likes girls, and I'll do anything to be with her!
info.description:
I am 17 years old, and my name is Jack, writing on behalf of 124235a. Because I don't have a very recent photo of myself in my original form, I will post this photo (http://i48.tinypic.com/k1ao1.jpg) of my current one, in case any of you in the writing,com community are curious. My current body originally belongs to a freshman at my high school. I used my friend's pendant to become her so that I can learn more about her older sister, who is my age. Well, that's enough of my personal life! Now, to get back on track here: Everything in the following story is real. It is my best recollection of everything that happened just two months ago. Magic is real, and it's a shame the majority of our species lacks the ability to see its beauty. I have changed the names and descriptions of the characters based on my friends and family out of respect for their privacy.

-------------------------
Kara: http://www.cavemancircus.com/wp-content/uploads/images/2012/july/beautiful/beaut...
Emily: http://thechive.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/hot-redhead-12.jpg?w=500&h=712
-------------------------



"You know, Jack, there's a reason we're just friends."
This caught me by surprise. I always thought that I had had a chance to be with the love of my life, Kara -up to this point, of course. We were sitting atop a brick wall in front of a quiet little park not too far from our school, taking about our classes. The next thing she said nearly made me faint.
"I've been thinking a lot about things lately, and... and... I think I like girls." She cautiously turned her head to observe my reaction.
I was speechless.
"Well we could still be together -just not as boyfriend and girlfriend!"
"Huh." It was all I could say.
Kara cradled the pendant that hung around her neck and spoke once again. "Girlfriend and girlfriend?" She smiled cheekily.
"What are you talking about?!!" I was obviously upset.
"Well, Emily's going on a trip to Las Vegas with some of her party friends for the next month, and I promised her that I'd cover for her. You know, become her for a month so that her parents won't notice anything's up."
"What are you saying?" I snapped.
"I'm telling you we can still be together, at least for a little while! You can cover for Emily! It makes total sense! You like me. I like you as a friend, and Emily for her ...looks."
"I don't know, Kara."
"Don't worry. I can always cover for you, and my parents don't care!"
"If it means that we can really be toge-"
"YES!"
There was a long, thoughtful pause.
Kara pinched the pendant with her left hand and pressed her right hand against my chest. I immediately blacked out.
